original_text: He reigned three years in Jerusalem. His mother's name also was Michaiah the daughter of Uriel of Gibeah. And there was war between Abijah and Jeroboam.
korean_text: 예루살렘에서 삼 년 동안 다스리니라 그의 어머니의 이름은 미가야요 기브아 사람 우리엘의 딸이더라 아비야가 여로보암과 더불어 싸울새

sentences.original_text: He reigned three years in Jerusalem
His mother's name also was Michaiah
the daughter of Uriel of Gibeah
And there was war between Abijah and Jeroboam
